title: Krea AI — AI Tool Review
description: Krea AI offers real-time AI image generation and enhancement on an infinite canvas, letting you paint and see AI output update instantly. Krea AI is a creative AI platform featuring real-time image generation — as you draw or prompt, the AI generates matching images instantly. It offers an infinite canvas for creative exploration, AI video generation, image upscaling and enhancement, and a unique live generation mode where you see AI output update in real time as you type. Highlights: Real-time AI generation as you type. Infinite canvas for exploration. Image enhancement and upscaling. AI video generation. Creative-first interface.
